mflp.configScreen.title: MFLP Macros
mflp.macroConfigScreen.title: Macro Configurator
mflp.updateScreen.title: Update Available
mflp.settingsScreen.title: MFLP Settings
mflp.autoReplyScreen.title: Auto Reply config
mflp.autoReplyConfigScreen.title: Auto reply settings
mflp.tooltip.tickFreezeToggle: A toggle for better tick freeze
mflp.tooltip.tickFreezeKey: The hotkey for toggling tick freeze
mflp.tooltip.worldSetupKey: The hotkey for auto setting gamerules and a few others
mflp.tooltip.autoPlotHome: Automatically does /plot home, when joining synergy
mflp.tooltip.autoWbBlacklist: A toggle for auto welcome back blacklist
mflp.tooltip.autoWbWhitelist: A toggle for auto welcome back whitelist
mflp.tooltip.autoWelcome: Automatically says welcome! when a new person joins synergy
mflp.tooltip.autoWB: Automatically says wb when someone comes back from being afk or joins synergy
mflp.tooltip.wbBlacklist: The list of names to ignore people when using auto wb, separated by a space
mflp.tooltip.wbWhitelist: The list of names to say wb to when using auto wb, separated by a space
mflp.tooltip.wbMessageTooltip: What message auto welcome back should say
mflp.tooltip.welcomeMessageTooltip: What message auto welcome should say
